info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 17 at 12:01PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Light freezing rain expected early this afternoon in the Schoharie Valley, Helderbergs and parts of the Capital Region... Light freezing rain is affecting the Schoharie Valley early this afternoon. The narrow band of light freezing rain will track through the Helderbergs, Schenectady and southern Saratoga Counties through 3 PM. Some parts of Albany could see some freezing sprinkles as well, just enough to make untreated surfaces a little icy. A glaze of ice is likely on untreated surfaces and exposed objects in the Schoharie Valley, Helderbergs, Schenectady and Saratoga areas through 3 PM. Motorists are advised to slow down and use caution while driving this afternoon.
